original_title: Allman Brothers Band - Vol. 1 - Duane & Berry
overview: Various live performances from the Allman Brothers Band while Duane Allman and Berry Oakley were still alive.  Includes, HOF Tribute, Fillmore East, NY 9-23-1970 show (5 songs), ABC In Concert appearance from Hempstead, NY 11-2-1972 (Berry's last public performance), "Southern Voices, American Dream" documentary by Ken Hey, Live clips from Love Valley 7-19-1970 and Central Park, NYC 1970, Statesboro Blues (promo video from DREAMS) and closing slideshow.
title: Allman Brothers Band - Vol. 1 - Duane & Berry
